title: Why is Victorious Sivir up, but others V skins aren't?
body:
In the champions page, click on Sivir, and you can see her Victorious skin (Unavailable of course...), but Janna/Jarvan/Morgana/Elise don't have theirs showing?

I hate the idea of those skins so much, and its horrible shoving it in your face every time you go to a champion's profile...

but why is Sivir's showing and no one else?

replies.body: She's probably going to get another victorious skin tbh, no champ has come close to her impact this season

> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gWFV4FHE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-30T02:57:34.893+0000)
>
> She's probably going to get another victorious skin tbh, no champ has come close to her impact this season

ekko?

> [{quoted}](name=Mesprit,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gWFV4FHE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-08-30T03:58:42.197+0000)
>
> ekko?

Ekko has only really hit his stride in Comp when he was seen in the top lane

yasou? ekko? jihn? ryze? zyra? or basically anything that had a stupid high pick/ban rate at any point this season. They don't have to do a second victorious skin for sivir and with the nerfs before worlds I feel her impact will be alot less, when this season has been dominated by quite a number of overall much stronger than average champions. I feel the odds are that it's going to be either yasou or zyra, probably zyra since near the start of the season she dominated the ap support meta like crazy and she doesn't have that many skins.

> [{quoted}](name=Nightjar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gWFV4FHE,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-30T04:07:51.978+0000)
>
> yasou? ekko? jihn? ryze? zyra? or basically anything that had a stupid high pick/ban rate at any point this season. They don't have to do a second victorious skin for sivir and with the nerfs before worlds I feel her impact will be alot less, when this season has been dominated by quite a number of overall much stronger than average champions. I feel the odds are that it's going to be either yasou or zyra, probably zyra since near the start of the season she dominated the ap support meta like crazy and she doesn't have that many skins.

if jhin gets a victorious skin i will demote then end my life

Pretty sure it goes by if you were around for it, morgs skin is still up for me which i don't have where as J4, Janna or Elise's 
skins aren't up where i wasn't playing around then.

If it is going through the cycle of roles Top would be the next one as it goes J4 Season 1 Top, Janna Season 2 Sup, Elise Season 3 Jungle, Morgana Season 4 Mid/Sup and Sivir Season 5 adc. Possibly Ekko or Gangplank
